name: Workplace Hazards
description:
Welcome to your mandatory Workplace Safety Training Module! This short interactive guide is here to educate you and a fellow employee about the many dangers and hazards that can occur in the workplace. 

Jump, push, and die your way through a new avenue of learning!

Note: This game is meant for 2 players, and while use of the keyboard is possible, it is HIGHLY recommended to use Playstation 4 controllers.

This game was created in one month by the wonderful team of:

Annamaria Koshy: Graphic Designer, Systems Programmer

Carsen Decker: Systems Programmer, FX Artist, Level Designer

Kate Howell: Project Manager, Gameplay Programmer, Level Designer

Logan Kornota: Sprite Artist, Character Artist

Luke Brockmann: Writer, Graphic Designer, Level Designer
